program.name: Module Craft Code CLI
program.description: Versatile CLI for generating and managing modules, components, events and configuration files in Minecraft projects.

init.description: Initializes the project with an addon.properties file.

option.n: Specifies the name of the addon.

exits.1: You can't initialize another project, the file

questions.1: Do you want to place a namespace?:

option.t: Specify the type of item to create - Only behavior
option.m: Indicates if the item will have a custom section in the Minecraft menu - Only behavior

exits.1: You can't generate an item in a project without the file

questions.1: Do you want to add customized components?:
questions.2: Would you like to add another customized component?:

error.1: It is not possible to add customized components
error.2: No custom components in the file

option.r: Sets the Vanilla Minecraft identifier that this entity will use to build itself.
option.e: Specifies whether the entity will be under experimental features of Minecraft.
option.sp: Specifies whether the entity generator will appear in the creative inventory.
option.su: Specifies whether the entity can be invoked by commands in the game.

exits.1: You can't generate an entity in a project without the file

spinner.succeed: The entity ${options.name} has been successfully created!!

option.m: Indicates if the block will have a custom section in the Minecraft menu - Only behavior
option.l: Defines how a block behaves when detecting a liquid - Only behavior
option.r: Defines the texture material of the block - Only behavior

exits.1: You can't generate an block in a project without the file

questions.1: Do you want to add customized components?:
questions.2: Would you like to add another customized component?:

error.1: It is not possible to add customized components
error.2: No custom components in the file

spinner.succeed: The block ${options.name} has been successfully created!!
The texture ${textureName} has been successfully added!!

questions.1: Enter the extraction time (leave empty mask 4):

block.description: Creates a custom component for a block.

option.n: Specifies the name of the block component
option.d: Specifies the description of the block component

exits.1: You can't generate a block component in a project without the file.
exits.2: You can't generate a component in a project that is not behavior.

block.invalid: You must select at least one event.

spinner.succeed: The ${options.name} component has been successfully created!

item.description: Creates a custom component for a item.

option.n: Specifies the name of the item component
option.d: Specifies the description of the item component

exits.1: You can't generate a item component in a project without the file.
exits.2: You can't generate a component in a project that is not behavior.

item.invalid: You must select at least one event.

spinner.succeed: The ${options.name} component has been successfully created!

common.description: Generate one or more files of the common category [lang|manifest|library|icon].

option.r: Specifies the region for language localization

exits.1: You can't generate a language file in a project without the file
exits.2: Location was not selected or is not valid.

spinner.succeed: The language file ${options.region} has been successfully created!

manifest.description: Generates a manifest file for behavior | resource | skin

option.l: Links a resource_pack to a behavior_pack
option.c: Enables the capabilities in a resource_pack

exits.1: You can't generate a manifest file in a project without the file

spinner.succeed: The manifest.json file has been successfully created!

option.m: Specifies the library to be added

exits.1: You can't generate a library file in a project without the file
exits.2: You can't add a library in a project that is not behavior.

errors.1: The library was not selected or is not valid.

icon.description: Set a generic icon for your project

exits.1: You can't add an icon in a project without the file
exits.2: You can't add an icon in a project that is not a behavior or resource.

create.succeed: The icon ${iconsNames[options.icon]} has been set correctly for your project.
create.error: The icon ${iconsNames[options.icon]} was not set correctly for your project.

error.1: The name must include ":" to separate namespace

option.l: Specifies the language of the program
